title: aio-app-template-registry-schema
description: A schema for the Adobe App Builder Template registry

id.description: The unique identifier of the template in the UUID format

author.description: The name of the template's author on npmjs.com

name.description: The name of the template on npmjs.com

adobeRecommended.description: Whether the template is recommended by Adobe

latestVersion.description: The version of the template in the semver format

publishDate.description: The date the template was published in the ISO 8601 format

extension.description: It contains the extension metadata if the template implements an extension point

categories.description: A list of categories the template belongs to

apis.description: A list of Adobe APIs required by the template

code.description: The sdk code of the service

runtime.description: Whether to add Runtime to App Builder application or not.

keywords.description: A list of keywords specified in the packages.json file

status.description: A status of a package in Template Registry. "Error" indicates that an application error occurred.

links.description: A list of locations where the package's code can be found
